values.help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).
values.label: Set to Default

values.help: Configure what the external contact sends when triggered. (Default: 0)
values.label: External Contact

items.label: Send a alarm report with type 2.
Send a Basic set frame to all nodes in association group 2.

values.help: Is not used but can still be set and requested.
values.label: Not used

values.help: Is not used but can still be set and requested.
values.label: Not used

items.label: Mode 3: Z-Wave chip is always on to request e.g. version or manufacturer id.

values.help: A signed integer to determine the offset of the temperature. (Default: 0)
values.label: Temperature offset

values.help: Debounce time when the external contact is opened. (Default: 0)
values.label: Extern Contact Debounce ON

values.help: Debounce time when the external contact is opened. (Default 0)
values.label: Extern Contact Debounce OFF

values.help: A delay from the wake up time to give the external contact a chance to change his status. (Default 0, value * 100 ms, 0 - 25,5 seconds)
values.label: Wake up delay
